post.text: So nice - great Americans outside Trump Tower right now. Thank you! (Sorry I am not there - just landed in Arizona!)

comment.author: Dallas
comment.text: Must b nice to own this building and not pay taxes for years and even brag about it. Thump should b the one under investigation and n jail.!!!!!!!

replies.author: Bailey
replies.text: Wow, the trolls are out in full force today! Maybe their payments per comments doubled after the FBI came back for their boss. Hahahahaaa.

replies.author: Clint
replies.text: Well he is hardworking .sleeps only 3-4 hours
